channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @abgoldberg Thanks but I'm working on the server in node.js and need something quickly.
item.source:markdown: @abgoldberg Thanks but I'm working on the server in node.js and need something quickly.

item.description:
I have a regex that strips all HTML elements from a string. Now I want one that does less, it strips all markup except <p> and </p>. Then I want one that takes a list of elements it should leave in place. Any help most appreciated!

https://t.co/DS5ppWeUHM
item.source:markdown:
I have a regex that strips all HTML elements from a string. Now I want one that does less, it strips all markup except <p> and </p>. Then I want one that takes a list of elements it should leave in place. Any help most appreciated!
https://t.co/DS5ppWeUHM

item.description: @ScottHansonDE Every hour on the news last night started with 45 minutes of more non-news about the queen. Followed by the standard 15 minutes on Trump. Then the next host comes on and does the same thing. I watched football instead.
item.source:markdown: @ScottHansonDE Every hour on the news last night started with 45 minutes of more non-news about the queen. Followed by the standard 15 minutes on Trump. Then the next host comes on and does the same thing. I watched football instead.

item.description:
People arenâ€™t wearing masks, even at the pharmacist, the person who gave me my booster said she didnâ€™t need one because she just got over her second bout with Covid. What? Unreal. Then it came to me, this is normal. Itâ€™s why even when the temperature..

in California is over 100 in lots of places, people are still pumping carbon into the atmosphere. Pakistan is drowning, and lake powell is dry. Business as usual. What was abnormal was the brief..

period when many made sacrifices to fight Covid. Now we just shrug it off, i guess?
item.source:markdown:
People arenâ€™t wearing masks, even at the pharmacist, the person who gave me my booster said she didnâ€™t need one because she just got over her second bout with Covid. What? Unreal. Then it came to me, this is normal. Itâ€™s why even when the temperature..
in California is over 100 in lots of places, people are still pumping carbon into the atmosphere. Pakistan is drowning, and lake powell is dry. Business as usual. What was abnormal was the brief..
period when many made sacrifices to fight Covid. Now we just shrug it off, i guess?
